remarks: The sequence of partial products of a finite product converges to the whole product.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 4-Dec-2017.)
statement:
prodmo.1 $e |- F = ( k e. ZZ |-> if ( k e. A , B , 1 ) ) $.
prodmo.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
prodrb.3 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) $.
fprodcvg.4 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ ( M ... N ) ) $.
fprodcvg $p |- ( ph -> seq M ( x. , F ) ~~> ( seq M ( x. , F ) ` N ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d F k $.
$d M k $.
$d N k $.
$d k ph $.
